name: Suisei Will Save Us All
description:
*Download is recommended if web version runs slow or is broken.

This game is being made for Sui-chan's third birthday!

Each level features one of her original songs. Only level 1 is currently available to play.

Currently working on levels 2 (Next Color Planet) and 3 (Pieces). Hopefully, all three levels planned are finished on or before March 22 (likely not tho).

 Controls: wasd/arrow keys & space bar/enter key

Credits:

Hoshimachi Suisei for saving us all. (and her membership stickers) 

ITYH for the tracks used as level BGM.  

わくわくクッキングタイム的なBGM  by 鷹尾まさき(タカオマサキ) @ フリーBGM DOVA-SYNDROME (forgot to put it in the in game credits. will add in next update)

Taira Komori for the SFX. 

planet drop for the rest.

 

Disclaimer:

This is not an official Hololive game. This is a free fangame and is allowed under Hololive's derivative works guidelines.  © cover corp.

 

Otsumachi~
